text:
@CNN During an appearance with Texas Gov. Greg Abbott in Dallas, Pence made a push for wearing a face mask to protect from coronavirus after months of not publicly doing so. Because the @GOP is grooming Pence for a run for the White House "before" Nov 3.

"FOOD  - FOR - THOUGHT". https://t.co/P43FaXYYG2
